title: The Wee Adventures of Shabu Shabu: The Jade Legend
description: Shabu Shabu, a little rabbit inventor who loves tinkering in the lab with her famous grandfather, dreams of having her own adventures beyond the safe burrow despite her grandfatherâ€™s warnings. One night, Shabu makes a shocking discovery and embarks on a dangerous voyage with her best friend Chow.
author: Kristina Thornton
